title: tristana jump nerf?
body: will we see any nerfs on tristanas jump? after kill/assists it rests... , she can go away from enemy tower to the middle of her lane.. ^__^

replies.body:
Funny how you mention that but not {{champion:121}}  who can do the same thing but kill you faster.

Trist is in a pretty bad spot as an ADC. If anything we will see buffs before nerfs.

i hate tristana as well, and i hate her stupid W , that can reset an infinite million amount of times.

Unfortunately, she is not in a good spot now. So if riot ever nerfs her W, they will give her some HEAVY compensation buffs to make up for it.
her W is useless as long as you have some sort of hard cc. just target where she is jumping from and it will still root her, she isnt untargetable while jumping
